program combined

    implicit none

    character(len=100) :: line1, u, str0, adjusted_line
    integer :: a, b, new_a, new_b, n, i, ans, pos

    ! Read first line
    read(*, '(A)') line1

    ! Adjust first line to remove leading spaces
    adjusted_line = adjustl(line1)

    ! Find first space in adjusted_line
    pos = index(adjusted_line, ' ')

    if (pos == 0) then
        str0 = trim(adjusted_line)
    else
        str0 = adjusted_line(1:pos-1)
    end if

    ! Read second line (a and b)
    read(*, *) a, b

    ! Read third line (u)
    read(*, '(A)') u

    ! Compute first part's output
    if (u == str0) then
        new_a = a - 1
        new_b = b
    else
        new_a = a
        new_b = b - 1
    end if

    ! Second part's input is new_a
    n = new_a

    ! Compute the second part's ans
    ans = 0
    do i = 1, n
        ans = ans + i * (n / i) * ( (n / i) + 1 ) / 2
    end do

    ! Output the result
    print *, ans

end program combined
